infos.value: Yer back-stabbing bastard!
I don't recall ever working under you!
Filthy slug...
Lord Sterne, do not falter! You can take Muraga—!
What exactly is going on here?
Lord Sadali! This cur...Sterne...he's gone an' betrayed us!
The betrayal here is not by me, Sadali.
I was promised that Oelde was mine to kill...
You are correct. Yours and no one else's.
Then why!? Name the bastard who attacked him!
Sterne, enough! You mustn't listen to him!
Mont...
Don't you remember the promise we made?
...Promise?
We promised to work together to make Leonis the greatest kingdom in the land.
A short while ago, I received a report.
It seems that both Lady Helena and Sir Owe have breathed their last.
Infighting was the cause, apparently.
...What did you say!?
That's...
That's a lie! You speak the impossible!
No word of it is a falsehood.
Both Queen Helena and Sir Owe had been taken captive by Fennes.
Alas, it appears that they could not tolerate their status as prisoners.
Queen Helena discarded the shackles of her own restraint and charged recklessly into combat, whereupon...
So they're really...dead? Mother... Master...
I am afraid so. It is a most heartbreaking affair.
They may have been prisoners from an enemy nation, but I had given strict orders that they be treated with respect.
Alas... I offer my deepest condolences.
Nonsense! You were the ones who killed Mother! I know it!
Do you truly believe that?
Queen Helena was the cornerstone of our strategy. So long as she survived, we could force your unconditional surrender.
Surely you realize this?
Th-that's...
This is mere conjecture, of course, but...
I would wager that they chose to die in the heat of battle rather than remain captive. Was that not what King Oelde ordered?
Oelde, answer!
I need not answer...anyone.
Then it was because of you! You're the reason Mother is dead!
Sterne! Cease this madness!
Get out of my way!
If you stand between us...I'll kill you too, Mont!
I...I will not stand aside!
I will protect the Leonis bloodline—from my own brother, if I must!
